heading: HB04916
0: AN ACT MANDATING FIRE SAFETY AWARENESS AMONG ELEMENTARY AND HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE since 2019-10-02
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04916
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING FIRE SAFETY AWARENESS AMONG ELEMENTARY AND HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Proposes to mandate all schools to set up an alternative classroom learning system by which to instill fire safety.
ALIAS NAME : "Fire Safety Awareness for Kids Act"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, PRECIOUS HIPOLITO
DATE FILED : 2019-09-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Reyes (000 2019-12-05)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BASIC EDUCATION AND CULTURE ON 2019-10-02
